Levels.animal_target: An image containing an animal that is a target in a go-nogo animal categorization task
Levels.easy_target: An image containing an animal (easy to detect) that is a target in a single target image detection task
Levels.difficult_target: An image containing an animal (hard to detect) that is a target in a single target image detection task
Levels.nonanimal_target: An image not containing an animal that is a target in a single target image detection task
Levels.animal_distractor: An image not containing an animal that is a distractor in a go-nogo animal categorization task
Levels.easy_distractor: An image not containing an animal that is a distractor in a single target easy animal image detection task
Levels.difficult_distractor: An image not containing an animal that is a distractor in a single target difficult animal image detection task
Levels.nonanimal_distractor: An image not containing an animal that is a distractor in a single target non-animal image detection task

Levels.nogo: No-go type trial in go-no task
